payload.content: Anthropic is adopting a disciplined strategy regarding spending and algorithmic efficiency, contrasting with OpenAI's substantial $1.4 trillion compute commitments.

name: Anthropic is adopting a disciplined strategy regarding spending and algorithmic
content: Anthropic is adopting a disciplined strategy regarding spending and algorithmic efficiency, contrasting with OpenAI's substantial $1.4 trillion compute commitments.

payload.content: Anthropic co-founder Daniela Amodei suggests that the next phase of the AI boom will be determined by who can deliver the most capability per dollar of compute, rather than solely by the largest pre-training runs.

name: Anthropic co-founder Daniela Amodei suggests that the next phase of the AI boom
content: Anthropic co-founder Daniela Amodei suggests that the next phase of the AI boom will be determined by who can deliver the most capability per dollar of compute, rather than solely by the largest pre-training runs.

payload.content: Anthropic is considering a possible IPO in 2026.
